name: EMS Failsafe Response Reason
description: A CodeSystem to identify the Failsafe Response Reason for the Failsafe Alert.

concept.display: Intervention done - official outcome not yet received
Declined intervention – official outcome not yet received
Permanently moved out of area – official notification not yet received
Person has died – official notification not yet received
An alternate agreement is in place - for example, a person lives near the Scottish border and is registered with a Scottish HVS
Other - with mandatory text in the clinical record.
Person known to have left England
